description: Chad Rock returns to Divine Bitches for another day of training this time under the discipline of Mistress Lorelei Lee. Mistress Lorelei Lee chuckles and uses this against him stating that in the office having an ego and a cock may be a good thing but having a cock in her dungeon puts you at a disadvantage. She totally destroys his business suit and leaves him a disheveled mess using his cock for her sexual gratification then milking every bit of his sticky filth from his cock.
title: Your Cock Puts You At a Disadvantage In My Dungeon
